data.section: 1. 时间序列分析(预测，异常检测)
data.desc: 时间序列是数字化转型带来的一种常见数据类型。时序数据中蕴含了大量的信息，对时序数据的有效分析能够为不同应用场景提供有效的决策支持。比如道路交通状况预测可以帮助司机提早进行分流，负载预测可以帮助适配器提早做好调整的准备，机器运行状况检测可以提早发现可能发生的故障，进而开展预测性维护等。我们的研究主要集中在两大类分析——预测和异常检测。在达到高精度的同时，还关注其时效性，鲁棒性，可解释性，以及自动化。

content.title: Model-agnostic plugin
papers: Razvan-Gabriel Cirstea, Bin Yang, Chenjuan Guo, Tung Kieu, Shirui Pan: Towards Spatio-Temporal Aware Traffic Time Series Forecasting. ICDE 2022: 2900-2913
Razvan-Gabriel Cirstea, Tung Kieu, Chenjuan Guo, Bin Yang, Sinno Jialin Pan: EnhanceNet: Plugin Neural Networks for Enhancing Correlated Time Series Forecasting. ICDE 2021: 1739-1750

content.title: Automated correlated time series forecasting:
papers: Xinle Wu, Dalin Zhang, Chenjuan Guo, Chaoyang He, Bin Yang, Christian S. Jensen: AutoCTS:Automated Correlated Time Series Forecasting. Proc. VLDB Endow. 15(4): 971-983 (2021)
Xinle Wu，AutoCTS 2.0

content.title: Transformer-based forecasting:
papers: Razvan-Gabriel Cirstea, Tung Kieu, Chenjuan Guo, Bin Yang, Sinno Jialin Pan: EnhanceNet: Plugin Neural Networks for Enhancing Correlated Time Series Forecasting. ICDE 2021: 1739-1750

content.title: Neural ODE-based forecasting：
papers: Multivariate Time Series Forecasting with Dynamic Graph Neural ODEs. Ming Jin, Yu Zheng Yuan-Fang Li, Siheng Chen, Bin Yang, Shirui Pan. TKDE, 2022.

content.title: Markov Model-based forecasting:
papers: Bin Yang, Chenjuan Guo, Christian S. Jensen: Travel Cost Inference from Sparse, SpatioTemporally Correlated Time Series Using Markov Models. Proc. VLDB Endow. 6(9): 769-780 (2013)

content.title: Others:
papers: Razvan-Gabriel Cirstea, Darius-Valer Micu, Gabriel-Marcel Muresan, Chenjuan Guo, Bin Yang: Correlated Time Series Forecasting using Multi-Task Deep Neural Networks. CIKM 2018: 1527 1530

Nicolaj Casanova Abildgaard, Casper Weiss Bang, Jonas Hansen, Tobias Lambek Jacobsen,Thomas Højriis Knudsen, Nichlas Ørts Lisby, Chenjuan Guo, Bin Yang: A Correlated Time Series Forecast System. MDM 2020: 242-24

data.section: 2. 时空数据分析（状态预估，偏好识别，决策）
data.desc: 时空数据包含随时间变化的空间信息，比如轨迹数据。我们的研究主要集中在如何有效利用大规模的时空轨迹数据，赋能智能城市，绿色交通等。具体来说，时空数据分析包括交通状态预估、偏好识别和导航决策。涉及到了表征学习、图学习、多任务学习和图算法等。
